meanings.definition: A type of subatomic particle with zero electric charge and very small mass.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study antineutrinos to learn more about tiny particles.
meanings.sent2: Antineutrinos are elusive particles that can pass through matter easily.
meanings.sent3: The antineutrinos decided to have a dance party in the nucleus.
meanings.sent4: In the world of subatomic particles, antineutrinos are like ghosts haunting the universe.
meanings.sent5: Imagine antineutrinos as tiny, weightless dancers twirling through space.

meanings.definition: Particles that are the antimatter counterpart to neutrinos.
meanings.sent1: Detecting antineutrinos can help scientists understand the universe better.
meanings.sent2: Neutrinos and antineutrinos are like mirror images of each other.
meanings.sent3: The antineutrinos threw a surprise party for the neutrinos.
meanings.sent4: In the cosmic battle of matter and antimatter, antineutrinos play a crucial role.
meanings.sent5: The collision of neutrinos and antineutrinos creates a spectacular light show in space.
